# bioimage-repositories

Comparison of platforms for sharing biological imaging data

**Source:** Adapted from [Beth Ciminiâ€™s comparison
table](https://zenodo.org/records/7628604)

## Contributing

1.  Edit [`data/repositories.yaml`](data/repositories.yaml)
2.  Submit pull request

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED TABLE START -->

*Auto-generated from [data/repositories.yaml](data/repositories.yaml)*

| Repository | URL | Best For | Size Limit | Cost | Metadata |
|------------|-----|----------|------------|------|----------|
| **Zenodo** | [zenodo.org](https://zenodo.org) | All digital artifacts | 50 GB per collection (soft) | Free | None |
| **Figshare** | [figshare.com](https://figshare.com) | Research data outputs | 20 GB free, 5TB paid | Free-$585+ | Low |
| **Dryad** | [datadryad.org](https://datadryad.org) | CC0 non-human data | 300 GB | $120+ | Low |
| **Bioimage Archive** | [ebi.ac.uk/bioimage-archive](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/bioimage-archive) | Non-medical microscopy | No limit | Free | Medium |
| **IDR** | [idr.openmicroscopy.org](https://idr.openmicroscopy.org) | Reference datasets | 1 TB | Free | High |
| **EMPIAR** | [ebi.ac.uk/pdbe/emdb/empiar](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/pdbe/emdb/empiar/) | Electron microscopy | Tens of TB | Free | High |
| **Cell Painting Gallery** | [broad.io/CellPaintingGallery](https://broad.io/CellPaintingGallery) | Cell Painting datasets | No limit | Free | Medium |
| **SSBD** | [ssbd.riken.jp/repository](https://ssbd.riken.jp/repository) | Quantitative biology | 16GB per file | Free | Medium |
| **BBBC** | [broad.io/BBBC](https://broad.io/BBBC) | Benchmark datasets | No limit | Free | Medium |
